info.title: Stocklytics Intraday Historical Stock Prices API
info.description: The Intraday Historical Prices API allows you to get a list of the price for a particular stock for the current day (or the latest day of trading if markets are closed) in 5 minute intervals. This data is perfect for generating intraday stock graphs, or performing stock analysis in near real-time. Data for this API is updated every 5 minutes.

get.description: The Company Data API allows you to retrieve company information about a particular stock/ticker code.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Allows us to identify the request initiator.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: The stock code/ticker for the stock to look up.

get.description: The Historical Prices API can be used to look up the Open, Close, High and Low price, as well as the volume of stock traded for a stock code within a particular date range. The API supports the downloading the entire historical data set we have on file for a stock, we index data for a stock with a start date of January 1st 1980.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Allows us to identify the request initiator.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The start and end dates to return data for. Supply dates in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of returned data. Either CSV or JSON.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of returned data sorted by date. ASC for Ascending, DESC for Decending.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start and end dates to return data for. Supply dates in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: The stock code/ticker for the stock to look up.

get.description: The Intraday Historical Prices API allows you to get a list of the price for a particular stock for the current day (or the latest day of trading if markets are closed) in 5 minute intervals. This data is perfect for generating intraday stock graphs, or performing stock analysis in near real-time. Data for this API is updated every 5 minutes.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Allows us to identify the request initiator.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of returned data. Either CSV or JSON.

parameters.name: include_date
parameters.description: Include the corresponding date and time of the data. True or False.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of returned data sorted by date/time. ASC for Ascending, DESC for Decending.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: The stock code/ticker for the stock to look up.
